titleStmt.title: A speech delivered in Parliament, Novemb. 13, 1641 by Sir John Wray, a worthy member of that honorable assemblie, concerning the unlawfulnesse of bishops and episcopall authorities.
titleStmt.author: Wray, John, Sir, 1586-1655.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print showthrough with loss of print.
